#summary Manual page for run_vtr_flow.pl

= run_vtr_flow.pl =

== Introduction ==
The VTR flow consists of the following stages:
[http://vtr-verilog-to-routing.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/flow_diagram.png]

This script runs the VTR flow for a single benchmark circuit and architecture file.


The usage is:
<code>
run_vtr_flow.pl <circuit> <benchmark> [OPTIONS]
</code>

==Options==
*{{{-start_after <stage>}}}*: Start the VTR flow
